channel.title: Comments on: Corona Geek #64 – MobileAppChat Podcast and Graphics 2.0 Talk

item.title: By: Mo
item.dc:creator: Mo
item.content:encoded:
@Steve: WOW, I am sorry I missed this show! LOVE your podcasts. Always trying to listen to all of them. By the way the best EVER game review I have ever heard was the one with your son Noah for the game FunRun. The cutest review I ever heard. I suggest everybody to listen to it:)

http://mobileappchat.com/fun-run-review/

@Sergey, very COOL demo! Are you planning on releasing the codes for the demos? (skybox and the audio graphic effect) Both as super cool!

GREAT SHOW!

Mo
@LairdGames
